1.0.name: wordpress/extra-image-tags
1.0.description: Wraps all WordPress images in extra spans, to allow for more layout control when you write CSS. All extra spans are added render-time, meaning they aren't permanently added to your posts. The benefit is, if you redesign in the future and no longer need the tags: they were never there. This applies to images in all your posts, past, present and future.
